entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 1.

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 7.

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle or rain. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending in the evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of drizzle. Risk of a thunderstorm early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Thursday 13 April 2023
